metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5667 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the HTML-Scrubber module before0.15 for Perl, when the comment feature is enabled, allows remote attackersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted comment.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5667` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhtml-scrubber-perl - 0.11-1+deb8u1build0.14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libhtml-scrubber-perl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.11-1+deb8u1build0.14.04.1').
